title: elyADi bande
sahitya:
elyADi bande gOvinda celva bullalOcana pUrNa gOpAlakrSNa


caraNam 1    iLidu bandeyo tALa marana ondambinali tuLidu bandeyo mada kALingana mastakava 
kaLuhi bandeyo gollatiyara ninna hoLeva mukha kAnti kaLegundidavo kanda
    caraNam 2    Adi bandeyo makkaLoDane chenjDATavanu nODi bandeyo sukrta duSkrtada talegaLenu
kADi bandeyo gOpiyaranu ninna jODu divyAbharaNa saDalideyo kanda
    caraNam 3    uNDu bandeyo kapaTa pUtaniya kAyavanu koNDu bandeyo malla rAkSara shiragaLanu 
laNDatanavadu bEDavayya ninna puNDatanavadu sAku purandara viTTala
